DOC.criteria: BMI within 18.535.0 kg/m2 Healthy enough exercise Active inactive ( exercising time ) Taking drug affect energy expenditure ( e.g. , thyroid , glucoselowering drug ) Have gain lose 5 % body weight past 6 month Use tobacco Pregnant lactating plan become pregnant next 6 month Have health condition prevent individual safely exercise ( e.g. , cardiovascular , liver , endocrine , pulmonary disease )
